aston.group17.model

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • aston.group17.model.Station

  • public class Station
extends java.lang.Object
    The Station handles the initial entrance of a Driver and contains both the Shop and Pumps. Adds the Driver to the shortest pump and moves them to the shop when necessary
    Author:
    Kieran Gates, Mitch Feaver, Zak Hirsi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Station(int pAmount, int tAmount, double price)
      Contains a Shop and an ArrayList of Pumps, manages where Drivers will go

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      Runs act methods for each part of the station, the Shop and Pump.
      void addDriverToPumpQueue(Driver d)
      Adds vehicle to the shortest pump queue.
      void addDriverToShop(Driver d)
      Adds a Driver to the shortest till queue
      double countLostSales()
      Returns the amount of money lost from unhappy Drivers
      double countMoney()
      Returns the amount of money gained from the Shop
      double getMoneyLost()
      Returns the amount of money the Station has lost from Vehicles unable to fit in the Pump queues
      Pump getPump(int pump)
      Gets a specified pump
      java.util.ArrayList<Pump> getPumpArray()
      Returns the ArrayList of Pumps
      Shop getShop()
      Gets the Station's Shop object
      Pump getShortestPumpQueue(Vehicle v)
      Returns the shortest pump queue, checks all pumps for the one with the shortest queue, then checks if the vehicle will fit in the shortest queue
      int getTotalLostVehicles()
      Returns the number of vehicles that left the station due to it being full
      int getTotalVehicles()
      Returns the number of vehicles that have entered the Station

    • Constructor Detail

      • Station

        public Station(int pAmount,
               int tAmount,
               double price)
        Contains a Shop and an ArrayList of Pumps, manages where Drivers will go
        Parameters:
        pAmount - Amount of pumps the Station will have
        tAmount - Amount of tills the Shop will have
        price - Price of fuel at the Station

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Runs act methods for each part of the station, the Shop and Pump. If Driver is done at the Pump they are added to the Shop

      • addDriverToShop

        public void addDriverToShop(Driver d)
        Adds a Driver to the shortest till queue
        Parameters:
        d - Driver to be added to Shop

      • getShortestPumpQueue

        public Pump getShortestPumpQueue(Vehicle v)
        Returns the shortest pump queue, checks all pumps for the one with the shortest queue, then checks if the vehicle will fit in the shortest queue
        Parameters:
        v - Vehicle that will be checked against the queue to see if it can fit in any queue
        Returns:
        The pump object the vehicle will go in to. Returns null if v cannot fit in any pump queue

      • getPump

        public Pump getPump(int pump)
        Gets a specified pump
        Parameters:
        pump - Pump number you want to return
        Returns:
        Pump object

      • getPumpArray

        public java.util.ArrayList<Pump> getPumpArray()
        Returns the ArrayList of Pumps
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Pump

      • addDriverToPumpQueue

        public void addDriverToPumpQueue(Driver d)
        Adds vehicle to the shortest pump queue.
        Parameters:
        d - The driver to be added to the pump queue

      • getShop

        public Shop getShop()
        Gets the Station's Shop object
        Returns:
        Shop object

      • getMoneyLost

        public double getMoneyLost()
        Returns the amount of money the Station has lost from Vehicles unable to fit in the Pump queues
        Returns:
        Integer for moneyLost

      • countMoney

        public double countMoney()
        Returns the amount of money gained from the Shop
        Returns:
        Double of total money gained from the Shop's Tills

      • countLostSales

        public double countLostSales()
        Returns the amount of money lost from unhappy Drivers
        Returns:
        Double of total money lost from lost Driver sales

      • getTotalLostVehicles

        public int getTotalLostVehicles()
        Returns the number of vehicles that left the station due to it being full
        Returns:
        Integer of totalLostVehicles

      • getTotalVehicles

        public int getTotalVehicles()
        Returns the number of vehicles that have entered the Station
        Returns:
        Integer of totalVehicles
